attributes.comment:
I would like to express my concerns regarding the proposed increase of fees for
immigrant benefits and applications. I find this proposal outrageous. An 86%
increase in any fee is criminal. The people who are paying these fees are here
mostly due to poor financial status to begin with. Please take in to consideration
what you are asking for.... Are we trying to eliminate illigal immigration?? Well
raising fees to a level that is unaffordable, will work to deter anyone from using the
proper channels of immigration. For the most part, these are hard working people
just trying to earn an honest living. They are making positive contributions to
society..... why then are we searching for ways to punish them and send them
home??
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Bernadette Maguire
